好，我當都合理，但你簽rondo做乜鳩？？

而且DWade因年紀關係，唔係次次練習都會去，已經引起某啲小將不滿....大佬，你係熱火就話個個心照你係頭面人物就俾面你啫，
黎到公牛就唔係咁講，大家都明如果熱火早啲俾多幾M你你就根本唔會"coming home"，班細既唔會無條件黎尊敬你體諒你。
呢啲問題其實應該由教練去排解，
可惜Hoiberg真係唔適合教個人性格咁強烈既NBA。

應該話，公牛既front office有一手好牌，有啤有Dee又有蛇有花，
但竟然搞到兩頭唔到岸。

報導指，太陽將送出球隊最大的資產Eric Bledsoe或Devin Booker其中一人到帝王，但帝王要求太陽再加入Alex Len、T.J. Warren以及選秀權，來換取帝王核心DeMarcus Cousins。在太陽手頭上，他們手握熱火2018年及2021年的首輪選秀權。

Gambadoro reports the discussions have centered around involving small forward T.J. Warren, center Alex Len, Phoenix’s first-round pick this year and possibly more. The Suns own all of their future picks and also own two future Miami Heat first-round picks from the Goran Dragic deal.

Sacramento has the need for a lead point guard and 2017’s draft class has point guards near the top of many mock drafts, including Washington’s Markelle Fultz and UCLA’s Lonzo Ball.

Gambadoro said Eric Bledsoe and Devin Booker would not be in the deal.

The Milwaukee Bucks have agreed to trade Miles Plumlee to the Charlotte Hornets for Roy Hibbert and Spencer Hawes.

Plumlee re-signed with the Bucks in the 2016 offseason on a four-year, $52 million deal. Plumlee is averaging just 9.7 minutes per game this season for Bucks with his PER dropping from 17.4 to 8.0.

Hawes has a player option for the 17-18 season. Hawes signed a four-year $23 million deal with the Los Angeles Clippers in 2014.

Hibbert is on a one-year, $5 million deal.

The Bucks will release Steve Novak to clear a roster spot for Hawes and Hibbert, according to Adrian Wojnarowski.
